Class Login

java.lang.Object
controller.Login
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Login extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the Login view.

    • login

      public void login(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method attempts to log the user into system.

      LAMBDA: Returns true if the username is found in Users, adding it to the filtered list, which is then checked for any existing user.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - An action from the user.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • logLoginAttempt
